caption.p: Apoptosis related genes expression in MCF-7 treated cells with TCEO. Cells were treated with a concentration for 24 h. Fold differences in P53, Bax, Bcl-2, Casp-3, 9 & 8 genes relative to untreated cells were quantified using qRT-PCR. Statistical significance is expressed as *p < 0.05, **p < 0.01.
